info.author: Diptanil Saha
info.description:
covid19in.py
============

Data Library for COVID-19 REST API for India written in Python3. For more details regarding COVID-19 REST API for India, visit [<https://api.rootnet.in>](https://api.rootnet.in)

Getting Official Data (Case Count)
==================================

-   Case Count(Latest)

``` {.sourceCode .python}
import covid19in
c = covid19in.api()
c_latest = c.cc_latest()
```

-   Case Count(History)

``` {.sourceCode .python}
import covid19in
c = covid19in.api()
c_history = c.cc_history()
```

Getting Official Data (Testing Stats)
=====================================

-   Testing Stats(Latest)

``` {.sourceCode .python}
import covid19in
c = covid19in.api()
t_latest = c.ts_latest()
```

-   Testing Stats(History)

``` {.sourceCode .python}
import covid19in
c = covid19in.api()
t_history = c.ts_history()
```

-   Testing Stats(Raw)

``` {.sourceCode .python}
import covid19in
c = covid19in.api()
t_raw = c.ts_raw()
```

Getting Offical Data (Hospitals and Beds)
=========================================

-   Hospitals & Beds(Beds)

``` {.sourceCode .python}
import covid19in
c = covid19in.api()
h_beds = c.hb_beds()
```

-   Hospitals & Beds(Medical Colleges)

``` {.sourceCode .python}
import covid19in
c = covid19in.api()
h_medcolleges = c.hb_medcolleges()
```

Getting Offical Data (Contacts & Notifications)
===============================================

-   Contacts

``` {.sourceCode .python}
import covid19in
c = covid19in.api()
contacts = c.contacts()
```

-   Notifications

``` {.sourceCode .python}
import covid19in
c = covid19in.api()
notifications = c.notifications()
```

Unofficial Data
===============

-   Unoffical Sources

``` {.sourceCode .python}
import covid19in
c = covid19in.api()
un_source = c.un_sources()
```

-   Unoffical Patient Tracing Data

``` {.sourceCode .python}
import covid19in
c = covid19in.api()
un_data = c.un_data()
```

-   Unoffical Statewise

``` {.sourceCode .python}
import covid9in
c = covid19in.api()
un_state = c.un_statewise()
```

-   Unoffical Statewise History

``` {.sourceCode .python}
import covid19in
c = covid19in.api()
un_sthistory = c.un_sthistory()
```

Note
====

Offical Data Sources: 
-   [COVID-19 REST API for India](https://api.rootnet.in/) 
-   [Ministry of Health and Family Welfare](https://www.mohfw.gov.in/)

Unofficial Data Sources: 
-   [covid19india.org](https://covid19india.org)
